thread.title: adidas Is Releasing Rainbow Ultra Boosts to Support LGBT Pride Month
thread.title_full: adidas Is Releasing Rainbow Ultra Boosts to Support LGBT Pride Month

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: adidas Is Releasing Rainbow Ultra Boosts to Support LGBT Pride Month
text:
Continuing its support for the LGBT community, adidas is planning for an LGBT-specific Ultra Boost release during the month of May.
The drop will arrive just before LGBT Pride Month in June, as the kicks boast the 3.0 Primeknit update and notable rainbow detailing at the heel. White Boost tooling plays contrast underneath, while tonal black laces then accompany the adi low-tops.
As for now, this is all we have regarding the forthcoming LGBT Boost, but be sure to check back in with us for additional details.
